summary: During one of Oregon's most violent storms, a young cellist seeks solitude and comfort in the safety of her large apartment, but soon realizes she might not be home alone.
cast: Louise Linton|John Robinson|Moby|Zach Myers|Mary McDonald-Lewis|Susannah Mars|Steven Beckingham|Teresa Decher|Ire Wardlaw|Aaron Trainor|Jillian Rabe|Dakota Zariwny
title: Intruder
